files.patch:
@@ -90,1 +90,3 @@
-MAN_SUBDIRS += share/man windows/man
+MAN_SUBDIRS += share/man $(TARGET_OS)/man
+
+MAN_DOCS_SUBDIRS += share/man windows/man
@@ -156,0 +158,4 @@
+FindModuleManDirsForDocs = \
+    $(strip $(wildcard \
+        $(foreach sub, $(MAN_DOCS_SUBDIRS), $(addsuffix /$(strip $1)/$(sub), $(TOP_SRC_DIRS)))))
+
